title:
The Speed of Convergence with respect to the Kolmogorov-Smirnov Metric
  in the Soshnikov Central Limit Theorem for the Sine-Process
abstract:
For rescaled additive functionals of the sine-process, upper bounds are
obtained for their speed of convergence to the Gaussian distribution with
respect to the Kolmogorov-Smirnov metric. Under scaling with coefficient $R$
the Kolmogorov-Smirnov distance is bounded from above by $c/\log R$ for a
smooth function and by $c/R$ for a function holomorphic in a horizontal strip.
